statements: DELETE FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE age > 30 AND income > 50000;
DELETE FROM underwriting_criteria WHERE credit_score BETWEEN 600 AND 700;
DELETE FROM PolicyApproval WHERE underwriting_criteria_id = 1 AND approval_status = 'Approved';
DELETE FROM UnderwritingCriteria WHERE criteria_name = 'Income' OR criteria_description LIKE '%risk%';
DELETE FROM policy WHERE policy_holder = 'John Doe' AND policy_type = 'Life';
DELETE FROM Underwriters WHERE Name = 'John Smith';
DELETE FROM Underwriters WHERE Name = 'John Doe' AND Department = 'Finance';
DELETE FROM Applicants WHERE name = 'John Doe';
